external_references.source_name: CISA AA24-038A PRC Critical Infrastructure February 2024
external_references.description: CISA et al.. (2024, February 7). PRC State-Sponsored Actors Compromise and Maintain Persistent Access to U.S. Critical Infrastructure. Retrieved May 15, 2024.

objects.description: [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) has used the Ultimate Packer for Executables (UPX) to obfuscate the FRP client files BrightmetricAgent.exe and SMSvcService.ex) and the port scanning utility ScanLine.(Citation: CISA AA24-038A PRC Critical Infrastructure February 2024)
